weapons.name: Voidfang
weapons.description: Yoshi's primary katana, known for its exceptional sharpness and lightness. Used during his legendary duel with Benkei at Gojo Bridge.
properties: Exceptional cutting edge that rarely dulls
Perfect balance allowing for Yoshi's precise fighting style
weapons.history: The origin of this blade is shrouded in mystery, though it was in Yoshi's possession during his pivotal duel at Gojo Bridge.
weapons.significance: The sword that Benkei sought as his 1000th trophy, but failed to claim, changing both warriors' destinies. The weapon that cemented Yoshi's reputation as a peerless swordsman.

weapons.name: Dawnpiercer
weapons.description: A companion blade to Yoshi's katana, this tanto serves as both tool and emergency weapon.

weapons.name: Stormpiercer
weapons.description: A compact yet powerful bow that Yoshi uses for ranged combat when necessary.

weapons.name: Crimson Dawn
weapons.description: A massive katana that most warriors could not even lift, forged specifically for Benkei's tremendous strength.

weapons.name: Dreadfang
weapons.description: Benkei's signature warborn naginata, a polearm weapon with exceptional reach and devastating cutting power.
properties: Reinforced shaft capable of blocking sword strikes
Crescent blade with both cutting and piercing capabilities
weapons.history: Wielded by Benkei during his legendary confrontation with Yoshi at Gojo Bridge.
weapons.significance: The weapon that defined Benkei as 'The Giant of Gojo Bridge' during his collection of 999 swords.

weapons.name: Judgment
weapons.description: A massive war hammer that complements Benkei's arsenal, allowing him to deliver crushing blows against armored opponents.

weapons.name: Higekiri
weapons.description: Yoshitsune's famous sword, known as 'Beard-cutter' in historical accounts. A well-crafted blade of exceptional quality that became legendary through its association with Yoshitsune's exploits.
properties: Perfect balance allowing for precise fighting style
Historical significance as a weapon of Minamoto no Yoshitsune
weapons.history: One of the historically significant swords associated with Minamoto no Yoshitsune. Its name 'Higekiri' ('Beard-cutter') reflects its legendary sharpness.
weapons.significance: The sword that Benkei sought as his 1000th trophy, but failed to claim, changing both warriors' destinies. A symbol of Yoshitsune's martial prowess.

weapons.name: Benkei's Naginata
weapons.description: Benkei's primary weapon, a traditional Japanese polearm consisting of a curved blade on a long shaft, allowing for powerful sweeping attacks and maintaining distance from opponents.
properties: Reinforced shaft capable of blocking sword strikes
Crescent blade with both cutting and piercing capabilities
weapons.history: Wielded by Benkei during his legendary confrontation with Yoshitsune at Gojo Bridge in 1180.
weapons.significance: The weapon that defined Benkei as 'The Giant of Gojo Bridge' during his collection of 999 swords.
